verses.verse: Take heed <S%G4337><s%> that you do <S%G4160><s%> not your <S%G5216><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> to be seen <S%G2300><s%> of them: otherwise <S%G1490><s%> you have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> your alms, <S%G1654><s%> do not sound <S%G4537><s%> a trumpet <S%G4537><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> you, as the hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and in the streets, <S%G4505><s%> that they may have glory <S%G1392><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, They have <S%G568><s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>
But when you do <S%G4160><s%> alms, <S%G1654><s%> let not your left <S%G710><s%> hand know <S%G1097><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> your right <S%G1188><s%> hand does: <S%G4160><s%>

That your <S%G4675><s%> alms <S%G1654><s%> may be in secret: <S%G2927><s%> and your Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sees <S%G991><s%> in secret <S%G2927><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> shall reward <S%G591><s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> you shall not be as the hypocrites <S%G5273><s%> are: for they love <S%G5368><s%> to pray <S%G4336><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and in the corners <S%G1137><s%> of the streets, <S%G4113><s%> that they may be seen <S%G5316><s%> of men. <S%G444><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, They have <S%G568><s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>

But you, when <S%G3752><s%> you pray, <S%G4336><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your closet, <S%G5009><s%> and when you have shut <S%G2808><s%> your door, <S%G2374><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> to your Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in secret; <S%G2927><s%> and your Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sees <S%G991><s%> in secret <S%G2927><s%> shall reward <S%G591><s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

But when you pray, <S%G4336><s%> use not vain repetitions, <S%G945><s%> as the heathen <S%G1482><s%> do: for they think <S%G1380><s%> that they shall be heard <S%G1522><s%> for their much <S%G4180><s%> speaking. <S%G4180><s%>

Be not you therefore <S%G3767><s%> like <S%G3666><s%> to them: for your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> things you have <S%G2192><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of, before <S%G4253><s%> you ask <S%G154><s%> him.

After <S%G3779><s%> this <S%G3779><s%> manner <S%G3779><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> you: Our Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> Hallowed <S%G37><s%> be your name. <S%G3686><s%>
Your kingdom <S%G932><s%> come, <S%G2064><s%> Your will <S%G2307><s%> be done <S%G1096><s%> in earth, <S%G1093><s%> as it is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
Give <S%G1325><s%> us this <S%G4594><s%> day <S%G4594><s%> our daily <S%G1967><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>
And forgive <S%G863><s%> us our debts, <S%G3783><s%> as we forgive <S%G863><s%> our debtors. <S%G3781><s%>

And lead <S%G1533><s%> us not into <S%G1519><s%> temptation, <S%G3986><s%> but deliver <S%G4506><s%> us from evil: <S%G4190><s%> For your <S%G4675><s%> is the kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and the power, <S%G1411><s%> and the glory, <S%G1391><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> you forgive <S%G863><s%> men <S%G444><s%> their trespasses, <S%G3900><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> will also <S%G2532><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> you:

But if <S%G1437><s%> you forgive <S%G863><s%> not men <S%G444><s%> their trespasses, <S%G3900><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> will your <S%G5216><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> forgive <S%G863><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> trespasses. <S%G3900><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you fast, <S%G3522><s%> be not, as the hypocrites, <S%G5273><s%> of a sad <S%G4659><s%> countenance: <S%G4659><s%> for they disfigure <S%G853><s%> their faces, <S%G4383><s%> that they may appear <S%G5316><s%> to men <S%G444><s%> to fast. <S%G3522><s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, They have <S%G568><s%> their reward. <S%G3408><s%>
But you, when you fast, <S%G3522><s%> anoint <S%G218><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> head, <S%G2776><s%> and wash <S%G3538><s%> your face; <S%G4383><s%>

That you appear <S%G5316><s%> not to men <S%G444><s%> to fast, <S%G3522><s%> but to your Father <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in secret: <S%G2927><s%> and your Father, <S%G3962><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sees <S%G991><s%> in secret, <S%G2927><s%> shall reward <S%G591><s%> you openly. <S%G1722><s%>

Lay not up for yourselves <S%G5213><s%> treasures <S%G2344><s%> on earth, <S%G1093><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> and rust <S%G1035><s%> does corrupt, <S%G853><s%> and where <S%G3699><s%> thieves <S%G2812><s%> break <S%G1358><s%> through <S%G1358><s%> and steal: <S%G2813><s%>

But lay up for yourselves <S%G5213><s%> treasures <S%G2344><s%> in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> moth <S%G4597><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> rust <S%G1035><s%> does corrupt, <S%G853><s%> and where <S%G3699><s%> thieves <S%G2812><s%> do not break <S%G1358><s%> through <S%G1358><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> steal: <S%G2813><s%>
For where <S%G3699><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> will your <S%G5216><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> be also. <S%G2532><s%>

The light <S%G5460><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%> is the eye: <S%G3788><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> be single, <S%G573><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> shall be full <S%G5460><s%> of light. <S%G3088><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> be evil, <S%G4190><s%> your whole <S%G3650><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> shall be full <S%G5460><s%> of darkness. <S%G4652><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> that is in you be darkness, <S%G4655><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> great <S%G4214><s%> is that darkness! <S%G4655><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> masters: <S%G2962><s%> for either <S%G2228><s%> he will hate <S%G3404><s%> the one, <S%G1520><s%> and love <S%G25><s%> the other; <S%G2087><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> else he will hold <S%G472><s%> to the one, <S%G1520><s%> and despise <S%G2706><s%> the other. <S%G2087><s%> You cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> serve <S%G1398><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and mammon. <S%G3126><s%>

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, Take no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G3309><s%> for your <S%G5216><s%> life, <S%G5590><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall eat, <S%G5315><s%> or what <S%G5101><s%> you shall drink; <S%G4095><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> yet for your <S%G5216><s%> body, <S%G4983><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall put <S%G1746><s%> on. <S%G1746><s%> Is not the life <S%G5590><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than meat, <S%G5160><s%> and the body <S%G4983><s%> than raiment? <S%G1742><s%>

Behold <S%G1689><s%> the fowls <S%G4071><s%> of the air: <S%G3772><s%> for they sow <S%G4687><s%> not, neither <S%G3761><s%> do they reap, <S%G2325><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> gather <S%G4863><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> barns; <S%G596><s%> yet your <S%G5216><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> feeds <S%G5142><s%> them. Are you not much <S%G3123><s%> better <S%G1308><s%> than they?
Which <S%G5101><s%> of you by taking thought <S%G3309><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> add <S%G4369><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> cubit <S%G4083><s%> to his stature? <S%G2244><s%>

And why <S%G5101><s%> take you thought <S%G3309><s%> for raiment? <S%G1742><s%> Consider <S%G2648><s%> the lilies <S%G2918><s%> of the field, <S%G68><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> they grow; <S%G837><s%> they toil <S%G2872><s%> not, neither <S%G3761><s%> do they spin: <S%G3514><s%>

And yet I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That even <S%G3761><s%> Solomon <S%G4672><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> his glory <S%G1391><s%> was not arrayed <S%G4016><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of these. <S%G5130><s%>

Why, <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> clothe <S%G294><s%> the grass <S%G5528><s%> of the field, <S%G68><s%> which to day <S%G4594><s%> is, and to morrow <S%G839><s%> is cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the oven, <S%G2823><s%> shall he not much <S%G4183><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> clothe you, O you of little <S%G3640><s%> faith? <S%G3640><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> take no <S%G3361><s%> thought, <S%G3309><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall we eat? <S%G5315><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall we drink? <S%G4095><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> Wherewithal <S%G5101><s%> shall we be clothed? <S%G4016><s%>

(For after <S%G1934><s%> all <S%G537><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things do the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> seek: <S%G1934><s%> ) for your <S%G5216><s%> heavenly <S%G3770><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> that you have need <S%G5535><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5130><s%> things.

But seek <S%G2212><s%> you first <S%G4412><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and his righteousness; <S%G1343><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things shall be added <S%G4369><s%> to you.

Take therefore <S%G3767><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G3309><s%> for the morrow: <S%G839><s%> for the morrow <S%G839><s%> shall take thought <S%G3309><s%> for the things of itself. <S%G1438><s%> Sufficient <S%G713><s%> to the day <S%G2250><s%> is the evil <S%G2549><s%> thereof. <S%G846><s%>
